attributes.review: I think that this app gave me a virus. It made my phone really toxic and overall slowed it down.
attributes.title: A virus

attributes.review: Terrible do not download. Crappy interface and horrible design, not to mention the app is focused on the racist, fascist, homophobic, xenophobic, misogynistic NAZI who disgraces our country with his mere existence!!!
attributes.title: Fascist Pig

attributes.review: This app said that my mother was fat, hairless, and retarded. That’s how the president views all people apparently. As a white woman in America I shouldn’t have to face this kind of treatment. I WANT TO SPEAK TO A MANAGER NOW!!!
attributes.title: Biased 🙄

attributes.review: This apps makes me wanna die!!! It’s so bad!!  The president comes to your house and steals your pet pig and turns it into bacon :( I wanted to die at that moment!
attributes.title: No!

attributes.review: This app has a horrible user interface!
attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review: To many notifications, it’s quite irritating.
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: This app was verrryyy glitchy and I hated it! 10/10 would not recommend!
attributes.title: Get that bread... then leave ✌️👋🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: This app is so gross when I opened it I saw an orange rat man on the screen. 0/10 would never download again.

attributes.review: This app is so trash it didn’t give me the cookies it promised me for and the microwave didn’t work

attributes.review: This app gives out false information, and it shouldn’t be an app on the Apple store. A disgrace.
